title: MANSLAUGHTER – Amends existing law to revise a provision regarding a penalty for vehicular manslaughter and to provide that the court shall inform a defendant of certain information regarding sentencing.
subject: COURTS
CRIMINAL OFFENSES AND PROCEDURES

MOTOR VEHICLES
